text: Evening, sir. Can I see some ID?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: We've had a few reports of someone matching your description acting suspiciously in this area. Just routine questioning.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Suspicious? I'm just walking home from work.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Downtown. The diner on Elm Street.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: And what time did you leave work?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: About an hour ago. I take my time walking.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Do you mind if I pat you down for weapons, sir?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: What? No! I'm not carrying anything.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Sir, it's a standard procedure. Please just cooperate.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: (sound of rustling) All clear. Just a wallet and keys. You're free to go, sir. Have a good night.
speaker: SPEAKER_00
